website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo Yoga Tab 3 Pro is the best Android tablet for watching video. Either alone or, thanks to its built-in projector, with a large group of friends.
pros: The Lenovo Yoga Tab 3 Pro has a built-in pico projector and an ergonomic design with a kickstand
Screen is sharp and speakers are loud
cons: It's a bit heavy and its cylindrical spine makes it awkward to hold in landscape orientation

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable tablet love the projector great sounding JBL speakers very loud but ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely durable tablet love the projector great sounding JBL speakers very loud but the apps oftenly crash mostly games very frustrating I wouldn't recommend this tablet if you're getting it for gaming I would highly recommend it if you're going to be using it for office documents on the go for work
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this tablet. It works exactly as I need, has a responsive screen, is fast, and has little crapware. Great battery life, the built-in stand is useful, and the projector is great for meetings. I'm disabled and use the tablet hours on end, so this is critical equipment for me. Oh, the sound is excellent, good volume.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R Ladd

customer_reviews.title: ... tablet's projector is a huge plus and definitely a great feature, the Yoga Tab 3 Pro's software was ...
customer_reviews.text: While the tablet's projector is a huge plus and definitely a great feature, the Yoga Tab 3 Pro's software was severely lacking. There was a huge memory leak/problem, leading to the tablet being incapable of opening PowerPoint, Firefox, and Facebook Messenger at the same time, constantly deleting the background apps' information. If you want a portable media device, then this is perfect for it as the image will be crisp and the projector will make for a great time. If you want a tablet to be a tablet that can multiple productive tasks, then this is not what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
